Job Description: Requirements for eligibility: Must be exceptionally good in developing web based applications using PHP & MySQL plus expertise in AJAX,  HTML5,  CSS3 & Javascript. B.E/ B.Tech/ M.Sc in the field of Computers OR Electronics & Communications with good academics. Must be able to single handedly develop web based applications with self- guidance. Must have developed a good number of web based applications. Good knowledge of backend creation & application deployment. Opportunity to work from home most of the times and visit office whenever its necessary.
